conbody.p: Eucalyptus 3.3 introduces the following command changes.

row.entry: To support tagging and filtering, we created the following new commands: euca-create-tags, euca-describe-tags, and euca-delete-tags.

The following commands were changed to add filtering support: euca-describe-addresses, euca-describe-availability-zone, euca-describe-bundle-tasks, euca-describe-images, euca-describe-instances, euca-describe-keypairs, euca-describe-regions, euca-describe-security-groups, euca-describe-snapshots, and euca-describe-volumes.
To support scaling, we created the following new commands: , , and .
To support monitoring, we created the following new commands: , , and .
To support load balancing, we created the following new commands: , , and .

conbody.p: For more information about Eucalyptus commands, see the Eucalyptus Command Line Reference Guide.
